channel.title: Need help (PI)
channel.description:
my server keeps crashing and run bat keeps repeathing this : [code][11/26/10 8:33 AM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:152) [11/26/10 8:33 AM]: Game saved for player Z [11/26/10 8:33 AM]: java.lang.NullPointerException [11/26/10 8:33 AM]: at server.model.players.Client.destruct(Client.java:152)
[11/26/10 8:33 AM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.removePlayer(Playe rHandler.java:326) [11/26/10 8:33 AM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:174) [11/26/10 8:33 AM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:152) [/code]

item.title: Need help (PI)
item.dc:creator: @adrian1372 adrian1372
item.description:
@adrian1372 wrote:

Webclient help requests goes to client help.

Go where the run.bat says the error occured and maybe u will see what is wrong. Just spelling something wrong can make it occur. Idk, i’m not good with PI… but find the place it occured and maybe u can fix.

Ofc, thats not gnna help you unless ur a good PI coder, but…

Read full topic
